aqua.css

A CSS library for building interfaces that look like Apple's classic Aqua UI from Mac OS X 10.0 - 10.4 (2001-2005). Featuring glossy buttons, traffic light window controls, and that iconic blue gradient style.

Install: npm install aqua.css or use the CDN: <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://unpkg.com/aqua.css">

Window

The classic Aqua window with brushed metal title bar and traffic light buttons (close, minimize, maximize/zoom).

My Window

This is a window with Aqua styling.

Show code 
<div class="window">
  <div class="title-bar">
    <div class="title-bar-controls">
      <button aria-label="Close"></button>
      <button aria-label="Minimize"></button>
      <button aria-label="Maximize"></button>
    </div>
    <div class="title-bar-text">My Window</div>
  </div>
  <div class="window-body">
    <p>This is a window with Aqua styling.</p>
  </div>
</div>

Inactive Window

Windows that are not in focus have grayed-out traffic lights.

Inactive Window

This window is not focused.

Show code 
<div class="window inactive">
  <div class="title-bar">
    <div class="title-bar-controls">
      <button aria-label="Close"></button>
      <button aria-label="Minimize"></button>
      <button aria-label="Maximize"></button>
    </div>
    <div class="title-bar-text">Inactive Window</div>
  </div>
  <div class="window-body">
    <p>This window is not focused.</p>
  </div>
</div>

Buttons

Aqua buttons feature glossy gradients. The default button uses the iconic blue Aqua style and can optionally pulse to draw attention.

Show code 
<div class="button-row">
  <button>Regular Button</button>
  <button class="default">Default Button</button>
  <button class="default pulse">Pulsing Button</button>
  <button disabled>Disabled</button>
</div>

Form Controls

Text Inputs

Show code 
<div class="field-row-stacked">
  <label for="text-input">Text Input</label>
  <input type="text" id="text-input" placeholder="Enter text...">
</div>
<div class="field-row-stacked" style="margin-top: 12px;">
  <label for="textarea">Textarea</label>
  <textarea id="textarea" rows="3" placeholder="Enter multiple lines..."></textarea>
</div>

Select Dropdown

Show code 
<div class="field-row">
  <label for="select">Choose an option:</label>
  <select id="select">
    <option>Option 1</option>
    <option>Option 2</option>
    <option>Option 3</option>
  </select>
</div>

Combobox

Text input combined with a dropdown button.

Show code 
<div class="combobox" style="width: 200px;">
  <input type="text" placeholder="Type or select...">
  <button></button>
</div>

Listbox

Multi-select list using select[multiple] or role="listbox".

Show code 
<select multiple style="width: 200px; height: 120px;">
  <option>Documents</option>
  <option selected>Pictures</option>
  <option>Music</option>
  <option>Movies</option>
  <option>Downloads</option>
</select>

Checkboxes

Show code 
<div class="field-row">
  <input type="checkbox" id="check1" checked>
  <label for="check1">Checked checkbox</label>
</div>
<div class="field-row">
  <input type="checkbox" id="check2">
  <label for="check2">Unchecked checkbox</label>
</div>
<div class="field-row">
  <input type="checkbox" id="check3" disabled checked>
  <label for="check3" class="disabled">Disabled checked</label>
</div>

Radio Buttons

Show code 
<div class="field-row">
  <input type="radio" id="radio1" name="radio-group" checked>
  <label for="radio1">Option A</label>
</div>
<div class="field-row">
  <input type="radio" id="radio2" name="radio-group">
  <label for="radio2">Option B</label>
</div>
<div class="field-row">
  <input type="radio" id="radio3" name="radio-group">
  <label for="radio3">Option C</label>
</div>

Progress Bar

Aqua-style progress bars with optional candy-stripe animation.

Standard progress bar (60%):

Show code 
<div class="progress-demo">
  <p>Standard progress bar (60%):</p>
  <div class="progress-bar">
    <div class="progress-bar-fill" style="width: 60%;"></div>
  </div>
</div>

Animated progress bar (40%):

Show code 
<div class="progress-demo">
  <p>Animated progress bar (40%):</p>
  <div class="progress-bar animated">
    <div class="progress-bar-fill" style="width: 40%;"></div>
  </div>
</div>

Indeterminate progress bar:

Show code 
<div class="progress-demo">
  <p>Indeterminate progress bar:</p>
  <div class="progress-bar indeterminate">
    <div class="progress-bar-fill"></div>
  </div>
</div>

Spinner / Loader

Animated loading indicators.

Show code 
<div class="button-row">
  <div class="spinner animate"></div>
  <div class="spinner-large animate"></div>
  <div class="spinner-small animate"></div>
  <div class="spinner-container">
    <div class="static-rainbow-bg bg-smooth-rainbow"></div>
    <div class="spinning-pinwheel">
      <div class="blade"></div>
      <div class="blade"></div>
      <div class="blade"></div>
      <div class="blade"></div>
      <div class="blade"></div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

Note: The pinwheel spinner requires this SVG in your HTML:

<svg width="0" height="0" style="position:absolute">
  <defs>
    <clipPath id="spinnerBlade" clipPathUnits="objectBoundingBox">
      <path d="M 0.5,0.5 Q 0.6025,0.2720 0.3372,0.0272 A 0.5,0.5 0 0 1 0.6628,0.0272 Q 0.7211,0.3834 0.5,0.5 Z" />
    </clipPath>
  </defs>
</svg>

Tabs

  • General
  • Advanced
  • About

This is the General tab content.

Show code 
<div class="tabs">
  <ul class="tab-list">
    <li class="active">General</li>
    <li>Advanced</li>
    <li>About</li>
  </ul>
  <div class="tab-panel">
    <p>This is the General tab content.</p>
    <div class="field-row">
      <input type="checkbox" id="tab-check" checked>
      <label for="tab-check">Enable feature</label>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

Fieldset

Settings
Show code 
<fieldset>
  <legend>Settings</legend>
  <div class="field-row">
    <input type="checkbox" id="fs-check1" checked>
    <label for="fs-check1">Option 1</label>
  </div>
  <div class="field-row">
    <input type="checkbox" id="fs-check2">
    <label for="fs-check2">Option 2</label>
  </div>
</fieldset>

Menu Bar

Classic Mac menu bar with dropdown menus.

  • File
    • New Cmd+N
    • Open... Cmd+O
    • Save Cmd+S
    • Save As...
  • Edit
    • Undo Cmd+Z
    • Redo Cmd+Shift+Z
    • Cut Cmd+X
    • Copy Cmd+C
    • Paste Cmd+V
  • View
    • as Icons
    • as List
    • as Columns
Show code 
<nav class="menu-bar">
  <ul>
    <li>
      <span class="menu-title">File</span>
      <ul class="menu-dropdown">
        <li>New <span class="shortcut">Cmd+N</span></li>
        <li>Open... <span class="shortcut">Cmd+O</span></li>
        <li class="separator"></li>
        <li>Save <span class="shortcut">Cmd+S</span></li>
        <li class="disabled">Save As...</li>
      </ul>
    </li>
    <li>
      <span class="menu-title">Edit</span>
      <ul class="menu-dropdown">
        <li>Undo <span class="shortcut">Cmd+Z</span></li>
        <li>Redo <span class="shortcut">Cmd+Shift+Z</span></li>
        <li class="separator"></li>
        <li>Cut <span class="shortcut">Cmd+X</span></li>
        <li>Copy <span class="shortcut">Cmd+C</span></li>
        <li>Paste <span class="shortcut">Cmd+V</span></li>
      </ul>
    </li>
    <li>
      <span class="menu-title">View</span>
      <ul class="menu-dropdown">
        <li>as Icons</li>
        <li>as List</li>
        <li>as Columns</li>
      </ul>
    </li>
  </ul>
</nav>

Toolbar

Icon toolbar for application actions.

Show code 
<div class="toolbar">
  <button class="toolbar-button">
    <span>Back</span>
  </button>
  <button class="toolbar-button">
    <span>Forward</span>
  </button>
  <div class="toolbar-separator"></div>
  <button class="toolbar-button">
    <span>Refresh</span>
  </button>
  <button class="toolbar-button" disabled>
    <span>Stop</span>
  </button>
</div>

Alert Dialog

Modal alert boxes with different icon types.

Are you sure you want to delete this file?

This action cannot be undone. The file will be permanently removed.

Show code 
<div class="alert-dialog">
  <div class="alert-dialog-content">
    <div class="alert-dialog-icon warning"></div>
    <div class="alert-dialog-text">
      <h3>Are you sure you want to delete this file?</h3>
      <p>This action cannot be undone. The file will be permanently removed.</p>
    </div>
  </div>
  <div class="alert-dialog-buttons">
    <button>Cancel</button>
    <button class="default">Delete</button>
  </div>
</div>

Slider

Range input with Aqua styling.



Show code 
<div style="width: 300px;">
  <label>Volume:</label>
  <input type="range" min="0" max="100" value="50">
  <br><br>
  <label>Blue slider:</label>
  <input type="range" class="blue" min="0" max="100" value="70">
</div>

Search Field

Rounded search input with magnifying glass icon.

Show code 
<input type="search" class="search-field" placeholder="Search..." style="width: 200px;">

Segmented Control

Button group for switching between views or options.

Show code 
<div class="segmented-control">
  <button class="active">Icons</button>
  <button>List</button>
  <button>Columns</button>
</div>

Table

Standard HTML table with Aqua styling. Use .interactive for clickable rows.

Name Date Modified Size
Documents Today, 10:30 AM --
Photos Yesterday --
report.pdf Dec 5, 2024 2.4 MB
notes.txt Dec 1, 2024 4 KB
Show code 
<table class="interactive" style="width: 100%; max-width: 500px; border: 1px solid #888; border-radius: 5px;">
  <thead>
    <tr>
      <th>Name</th>
      <th>Date Modified</th>
      <th>Size</th>
    </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
    <tr>
      <td>Documents</td>
      <td>Today, 10:30 AM</td>
      <td>--</td>
    </tr>
    <tr class="highlighted">
      <td>Photos</td>
      <td>Yesterday</td>
      <td>--</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>report.pdf</td>
      <td>Dec 5, 2024</td>
      <td>2.4 MB</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>notes.txt</td>
      <td>Dec 1, 2024</td>
      <td>4 KB</td>
    </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>

List View

Styled table specifically for file/item lists. Similar to table but uses .list-view class.

Name Date Modified Size
Documents Today, 10:30 AM --
Photos Yesterday --
report.pdf Dec 5, 2024 2.4 MB
Show code 
<table class="list-view" style="width: 100%; max-width: 500px;">
  <thead>
    <tr>
      <th>Name</th>
      <th>Date Modified</th>
      <th>Size</th>
    </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
    <tr>
      <td>Documents</td>
      <td>Today, 10:30 AM</td>
      <td>--</td>
    </tr>
    <tr class="selected">
      <td>Photos</td>
      <td>Yesterday</td>
      <td>--</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>report.pdf</td>
      <td>Dec 5, 2024</td>
      <td>2.4 MB</td>
    </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>

Tree View

Expandable hierarchical list.

  • Documents
    • Work
      • report.pdf
      • presentation.key
    • notes.txt
  • Pictures
    • vacation.jpg
    • profile.png
  • Desktop
Show code 
<ul class="tree-view" style="width: 250px;">
  <li>
    <details open>
      <summary>Documents</summary>
      <ul>
        <li>
          <details>
            <summary>Work</summary>
            <ul>
              <li>report.pdf</li>
              <li>presentation.key</li>
            </ul>
          </details>
        </li>
        <li>notes.txt</li>
      </ul>
    </details>
  </li>
  <li>
    <details>
      <summary>Pictures</summary>
      <ul>
        <li>vacation.jpg</li>
        <li>profile.png</li>
      </ul>
    </details>
  </li>
  <li class="selected">Desktop</li>
</ul>

Tooltip

Hover over an element to see the tooltip.

Show code 
<button class="tooltip" data-tooltip="Click to save your changes">Save</button>
<button class="tooltip" data-tooltip="Discard all changes">Cancel</button>

Balloon / Speech Bubble

Tooltip with a speech bubble tail. Use .balloon-bottom, .balloon-right, etc. for positioning.

This is a balloon tooltip with the tail pointing up.
Tail pointing down.
Show code 
<div style="display: flex; gap: 20px; flex-wrap: wrap; padding-top: 20px;">
  <div class="balloon" style="max-width: 200px;">
    This is a balloon tooltip with the tail pointing up.
  </div>
  <div class="balloon balloon-bottom" style="max-width: 200px; margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 20px;">
    Tail pointing down.
  </div>
</div>

Stepper

Number input with increment/decrement buttons.

Show code 
<div class="stepper">
  <button>-</button>
  <input type="number" value="5" min="0" max="100">
  <button>+</button>
</div>

Disclosure

Expandable section with disclosure triangle.

Advanced Options
Show code 
<details class="disclosure" style="width: 300px;">
  <summary>Advanced Options</summary>
  <div class="disclosure-content">
    <div class="field-row">
      <input type="checkbox" id="disc-check1">
      <label for="disc-check1">Enable logging</label>
    </div>
    <div class="field-row">
      <input type="checkbox" id="disc-check2">
      <label for="disc-check2">Debug mode</label>
    </div>
  </div>
</details>

Split View

Sidebar and content area layout.

Inbox
Sent
Drafts
Trash

Select a folder to view messages.

Show code 
<div class="split-view" style="height: 200px;">
  <div class="split-view-sidebar" style="padding: 8px;">
    <div style="padding: 4px; background: #2B99FF; color: white; border-radius: 3px;">Inbox</div>
    <div style="padding: 4px;">Sent</div>
    <div style="padding: 4px;">Drafts</div>
    <div style="padding: 4px;">Trash</div>
  </div>
  <div class="split-view-content">
    <p>Select a folder to view messages.</p>
  </div>
</div>

Scrollbar

Custom WebKit scrollbar styling. Scrollbars appear automatically on scrollable content.

Scroll this content to see the Aqua-styled scrollbar.

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

Sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation.

Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate.

Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident.

Show code 
<div style="height: 150px; overflow-y: scroll; background: white; border: 1px solid #888; border-radius: 5px; padding: 12px; width: 300px;">
  <p>Scroll this content to see the Aqua-styled scrollbar.</p>
  <p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.</p>
  <p>Sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.</p>
  <p>Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation.</p>
  <p>Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate.</p>
  <p>Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident.</p>
</div>

Graphite Theme

Add class="theme-graphite" to use gray instead of blue.



Show code 
<div class="theme-graphite" style="padding: 16px; background: #ECECEC; border-radius: 8px;">
  <div class="button-row">
    <button>Regular</button>
    <button class="default">Default</button>
  </div>
  <br>
  <div class="field-row">
    <input type="checkbox" id="graphite-check" checked>
    <label for="graphite-check">Graphite checkbox</label>
  </div>
  <div class="field-row">
    <input type="radio" id="graphite-radio" checked>
    <label for="graphite-radio">Graphite radio</label>
  </div>
  <br>
  <div class="progress-bar" style="width: 200px;">
    <div class="progress-bar-fill" style="width: 60%;"></div>
  </div>
</div>

Complete Example

A window demonstrating multiple components together:

Preferences
Display
Show code 
<div class="window" style="max-width: 350px;">
  <div class="title-bar">
    <div class="title-bar-controls">
      <button aria-label="Close"></button>
      <button aria-label="Minimize"></button>
      <button aria-label="Maximize"></button>
    </div>
    <div class="title-bar-text">Preferences</div>
  </div>
  <div class="window-body">
    <div class="field-row-stacked">
      <label for="username">Username:</label>
      <input type="text" id="username" value="admin">
    </div>
    <fieldset style="margin-top: 12px;">
      <legend>Display</legend>
      <div class="field-row">
        <input type="radio" id="light" name="theme" checked>
        <label for="light">Light mode</label>
      </div>
      <div class="field-row">
        <input type="radio" id="dark" name="theme">
        <label for="dark">Dark mode</label>
      </div>
    </fieldset>
    <div class="field-row" style="margin-top: 16px; justify-content: flex-end;">
      <button>Cancel</button>
      <button class="default">Save</button>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

aqua.css is inspired by Apple's Aqua interface (Mac OS X 10.0-10.4).
Built following the patterns of 98.css, XP.css, and system.css.
